title: Elon Musk says that China is ‘going to be great’ at AI development
description:
Tesla CEO Elon Musk expressed confidence in China’s ability to succeed in the field of artificial intelligence, the South China Morning Post (SCMP) said on July 6. Musk made his comments at the World AI Conference (WAIC), an event hosted by Chinese authorities to highlight Beijing’s AI ambitions. During an eight-minute video segment, Musk said: […]

The post Elon Musk says that China is ‘going to be great’ at AI development appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Fintech.li 2023 Conference: Connecting the Dots to Shape the Next Human Agenda
description: Liechtenstein, 5th July 2023 — Fintech.li is thrilled to announce its highly anticipated Fintech.li 2023 Conference, taking place on 11th-12th September in Schaan, Liechtenstein. Under the theme of “Drawing the dots – shaping the NEXT HUMAN agenda,” this groundbreaking event will bring together industry experts, thought leaders, investors, scientists, and entrepreneurs to explore the latest ...
